author: mkleint
msg: SUREFIRE-121 copy System properties from MavenSession.getExecutionProperties() mand not from System.getProperties(). fixes forked execution in embedded environment. Also call System.setProperties() only when execution was not forked.

author: olegk
msg: * Code improvements in DefaultListeningIOReactor and ListenerEndpointImpl

* Worked-around the problem that appears to be a bug in the NIO implementation on MS Windows platforms: for some inexplicable reason a key can be returned by the selector as valid and acceptable even after it has been canceled. An attempt to accept a connection from that channel, however, causes an ClosedChannelException

author: sebb
msg: Flag failed connection. Always print stats at end.
